channel.title: Beastly Tech - Is there anything we don't have?
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/98ahq8.png[/img] Coming soon to a Community near you.[/center]
[size=14pt][u][b]About Beastly Tech[/b][/u][/size] Beastly Tech was originally a regular old forum that provided an extensive amount of boards for various types of discussions including subjects related to the internet, technology and regular life, but after some deep thought, we decided to add some other activities that users could enjoy whilst waiting for new posts on the forum. So far we've added some neat little tools like an anonymous email sender, as well as some simple services such as forum and general software installs. Even though those are kind of "cool", We wanted something even cooler and something that would bring much more traffic through Beastly Tech, a Runescape private server!
[size=14pt][b][u]Resources we have[/u][/b][/size] - "Unlimited" paid web hosting from Host Gator. (Paid monthly) - A .com domain to present the website in a professional manner. (Paid annually) - A dedicated server for the private server to be hosted one. (Owned by a friend but he no longer needs it) - A standard IP.Board (Invision Power Board) license. (Was a one time payment of $149.99 USD)
[size=14pt][u][b]Goals[/b][/u][/size] - Create an entertaining and exciting server that maintains a stable economy at all times. - Create a server that has an extremely friendly environment for users that decide to play Beastly Tech. - Create a server that has perfected the majority of the most important features of a server.
[size=14pt][u][b]Current team[/b][/u][/size] Amazying - Server Sponsor Nexus_ - Server Developer Duskybby - Server Developer
[size=14pt][u][b]About the server[/b][/u][/size] Beastly Tech will use Ruix (the latest PJA Hyperion 459) as a base. Nexus_ (I) have decided to use the version that I still didnt release, which is atleast 3 weeks older than the one in the downloads section. We will spiff up the client alot, and add some new cache so it shows a lively feeling. Although putting all of these copyright infragments on the server, there will always be a little -credits- file in each client that will be released. We will also put up a webclient as soon as I finish the HTML codes.
[size=14pt][u][b]Pictures of progress[/b][/u][/size] [center][IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Shops.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/BarrageNEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/charscreen.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/coloredtext.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/hitthroughwood.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/lunarspells.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/npctalk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/pc1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/pc2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/skillcapeemotes.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/skillmenu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/squiretelling.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/welcomescreen.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/barrowsdig.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/beastlyT/barrowsdisturb.png[/img][/center] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Construction.png[/img] [size=14pt][u][b]Support us![/b][/u][/size] Banners: http://i45.tinypic.com/98ahq8.png
Website: [url=http://Beastly-tech.com]Beastly-tech.com[/url]

item.title: Beastly Tech - Is there anything we don't have?
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

I already did. I’ll upload some pics when I get home.

I’ll tell the truth, I took the code implements from a different revision of Hyperion that had custom loading and implemented it into this >.<

and thanks with the GL :o

item.title: Beastly Tech - Is there anything we don't have?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Nexus_, post:22, topic:342477”]Gracias.

UPDATE: Got godsword models and ints and adding them. Can someone do me a favor and get me Dragon Claws (the ones that aren’t cut off preferably)? Rep++; is given :). I’m just too lazy to do it.

EDIT: Done the godswords and now adding stances, etc.[/quote]

            if(i == 14484) {
                class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
                class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";
                class8.anInt174 = 44590;
                class8.anInt165 = 43660;//anInt165
                class8.anInt200 = 43660;//anInt200
                class8.anInt181 = 789;
                class8.anInt190 = 240;
                class8.anInt198 = 60;
                class8.anInt169 = -1;
                class8.anInt194 = -23;
                class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws";
                class8.aByteArray178 = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes();
            }

Read full topic

[size=14pt]About Beastly Tech[/size]
